channel.title: Project Rainbow?
channel.description:
Hello,
Does anybody have the Project Rainbow source and client? (Please dont say rip it from them or something like this, I have no idea how and i just want to have the normal client and source for quick and fast use) Every link that i could find was broken! I want to have it for personal experimentation. Been looking everywhere ...! :palm:
Well anyways appreciation and many thanks who has this for me! :)
`Reminance
